ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Hunting questions
ygData.msgSnippet: About MM faction, it depends on whether you have killed any MM guys before. Killing about 50 in wolf form will make your faction threateningly. Usually when
ygData.messageBody:
About MM faction, it depends on whether you have killed any MM guys before.
Killing about 50 in wolf form will make your faction threateningly. Usually
when you kill a bard you gain about 1 point of faction while killing a MM
guy may lose about 5 point of faction (ratio)..... So just wolfform and con
a guy.

You kill the dino for level 49 research words,pages,runes and he will
occasionally drop diamonds, jacinths and very nice gems.... and he spawns
very fast too about 4 min if ph doesnt spawn.

For solo kiting wiz from 40 can do EK guards at the EK villages, gnome
guards or dwarf guards up to you depending on whose faction you wanna ruin.
The single spectre in ferrott is not too bad too cause they run pretty slow
giving you time to nuke, however ferrott terrain sucks making you run up and
down hills and spectres can suck your life which is irritating and increases
downtime. While pulling the spectre make sure you pull away from the spectre
cave so another spectre doesnt join you.

Its root all the way coz its costs the least mana and its a level 4 spell
which means that no matter how bad u kenna whack , at level 50 99% you can
channel it off. I would believe that the resist rate of root is lower than
immobilize and enstill since its a lower level spell. However immobilize is
used cause its 1.8 sec compared to root 2.0 sec and immobilize can last
pretty long (if you are lucky and you dont whack it[for separating spawns])

I dont know about OOT stuff but i know therse a spectre island with 4
spectres together, pulling one will pull all i think. Theres also the
seafury cyclops island where level 40 cyclops spawn.... lots of hp and this
special level 37(?) named HG. I dont think they are good xp.. Maybe in a
group you can do seafury cyclops or the HG , dont think you can do that
solo.

The preacher is a shaman or cleric and shaman mobs are wussies hehe. As long
as the stuff around preacher are green you should have no prob soloing them
in my opinion. Guarding the preacher should be level 24 (?) mobs so at about
34-36 they should be green.

Hadden is about level 28. He spawns every 8 hours 20 mins + - 15 min due to
server lag. I dont have exact loc but in qeynos hills in the NW corner of
the map there is this enlongated lake and there will be this hut with a boat
beside it. He spawns outside the hut next to the boat, on land. Many people
believe that he drops the FB earring 50% but so far I have killed him 19
times and all have been FB earring. IMO simple camp and you can trade it for
VERY nice items even though its not that hard to get it. BUT since innoruuk
is a old server, you may/will face a problem of 5 level 50s all camping him
at the same time. Careful the FB earring is lore so if you intend to farm it
give it to your secondary char :)

Most undead (except Befallen and yard trash in Unrest garden) will kill you
even if they are green/ultragreen to you. Befallen, however, I believe the
stuff there will not attack you because they belong to the
BefallenInhabitants faction.

The method I mentioned is not an exploit. Its just a method of pulling the
mob. It will still come after you and hit you (not stuck). Its easier this
way because you dont have to chiong up the house staircase and risk getting
beaten up by green mobs (mobs outside dont hit you). He is pretty decent xp
but he will HT you... spawns very often and drops both the common drop (BS
mantle) and rare (BS tunic) pretty often. Hp maybe around 1200 and is good
till 36? Decent xp while camping for the mystic cloak mob.

Well there is a kobold section, bug section, imp section and FG section
(naggy). The kobold section is the first section you will meet which
includes level 33-42 kobolds and the next section is the bug section.
Running without sow from the bug section to the zoneline is about 10-15 secs
at most so its pretty close. Bats are the lowest level around 39-41, lava
beetles 41-43, and lava duct crawlers 42-45. Bats have a 5-10 sec stun as a
proc, beetles a 100 dmg (?) fire DD proc while the LDC procs a 400+ or 600
dmg dot (blood boil).

Mizy Monk of Lanys T`Vyl

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: 06 April 2000 10:32
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Hunting questions


> I have killed more than enuff bard so far (beyond repair liao), even the
> green bard in Felwithe attacks me everytime I go near him, does that mean
> my fraction with mistmoore is very good? ;)
>
> I heard from Fesse that the dino in OOT give lousy loot, so no point to
> camp for it, but it will be fun to form a grp to bangbang it for once or
> twice, shiok ;)
>
> I'm now 39, shld be getting my lvl 40 hell in 1 or 2 days time. I've been
> solo kiting Ulir and Ein in WK. I understand once I reach 42 Ulir will be
> super green to me and give no xp. What other places r there for a soli
> kiting wiz from 40 to say, 45? (NB: The single sprectre I heard is good
> xp, under which lvl? Thou' pple said it's always camp but same thing is
> said for barb village in WK yet I always can find a seat there w/o any
> prob). Anything to take note when kiting the single sprectre?
>
> So at 39, I can solo ancient croc. Btw, is root still good for my lvl? I
> mean, there are enstill and immobolize on top so which one is more
> effective? I heard some pple saying root is still better at high lvl
> whereas others said it's often resisted by high lvl mobs.
>
> OK, I give up on WK ogre, didn't know it's so high lvl. Btw Mass say the
> batskull is a rare drop...doesn't worth the time and effort. ;)
>
> Seem like OOT got good kills and good loots for high 30s till mid 40s, can
> elaborate further (both for wiz solo and grp).
>
> Fesse tell me must be at least lvl 40 to solo runed circlet (I know
> halfling warrior who solo got it at 36 btw), so which is true?
>
> Got the exact loc of Hadden? What is his lvl? How long is his spawn
time?
>
> Btw, is it true tat super green undead will attack u regardless how high
ya
> lvl is (in both bafallen and unrest)? Or the normal rules applies (ie if
> too high lvl, they won't attack u?)
>
> As for unrest, is the method u mention an exploitt? I read from the net
> that sometime GM hide there and teleport u to the mobs instead. ;( Tat
> knight good xp and money for what lvl till wat lvl, what's his hp and lvl?
>
> Wat abt the bug section in Sol b, can elaborate further?
>
> Ziltus, solo kiter...
>
> p/s: I wonder other than febon, kell and mass, do we have anymore early
40s
> members which we can form grp to explore the tougher dungone?
>
>
> On Thursday, 06 April, 2000 12:44 AM, Diablo
[SMTP:diablo99@...]
> wrote:
> > Heh theres no mob in Mistmoore called Mayong Mistmoore. Though mistmoore
> > stuff belong to Mayong Mistmoore faction, believed to be a level 53
> vampire.
> > But in actual fact, Mistmoore is a very easy dungeon to solo at level
> 50...
> > about 95% of the mobs in the castle are level 35 or below. Only problem
> is
> > that you need to have wolf form and havent ruined mistmoore faction
> before
> > so you dont agro everything around you.
> >
> > Alliwaezeur (sp?) is always level 50 but has much less hp than an
average
> > level 50 mob... necro and maybe shamans are the only classes able to
solo
> a
> > level 50 mob in 1 round without going oom
> >
> > For gator armor in Uguk, i recommend at least 39.... new nuke and you
> should
> > be able to solo a level 30 ancient croc with root nuke
> >
> > For runed circlet, 32+? is good enough when you get your fire nuke and
> able
> > to solo pull the mobs (ie. all green)
> >
> > For fishbone earring, you almost must have jboots/sow or Rephas, an
> > enchanter beside Hadden is green to you so he wouldn't jump into the
> > fight... About high 30s for Rephas to be green to you i think...
> >
> > Wk ogre shaman you need about level 48+ to solo. 1) The 4 ogre guards
> will
> > agro everyone within their HUGE agro radius (as huge as the furthest
> point
> > you can nuke them from) 2) If the ogre guards are green only 1 will come
> > after you and give you a nasty HT 3) Magic resist gear is very important
> > since you are taking a lot of HTs 4) If the shamans and chief goonda is
> > still blue to you they will jump in as well 5) Assuming you are level
48+
> > where everything is green to you, you pull 1 ogre guard, kill, 1 ogre
> guard,
> > then try to pull either goonda or the shaman directly beside him. 6)
> Ultra
> > tough camp if you are soloing.. no clarity and no heal and hard to keep
> up
> > with spawns 7) Very long spawn time...
> >
> > OOT oracle and his body guard. oracle is 35 guard is 42. lose neriak
> > merchants faction i think when you kill them. I recommend only trying
> them
> > after getting ice comet as oracle is a nuker. Elemental shield and
> > diamondskin up. Root the guard. And kite the oracle using root nuke or
> run
> > nuke. After oracle is dead immediately gate out or if you feel confident
> you
> > can kill the guard who drops standard level 40+ mob jewelry (mithril
> amulet
> > 92pp to merchants) If root breaks then you have to be skilful to try to
> root
> > the guard without taking too much damage from oracleagain.....
> >
> > OOT dunnoe what ogre heh but theres a special named Hill Giant who
spawns
> > very often.. Kite nuke at level 49+ with ice comet
> >
> > No pet in unrest means serious downtime for you have to clear all the
> > greenies. But if you intend to camp the undead knight theres a trick...
> At
> > about level 40 where most mobs are green to you, cast levitate on
> yourself
> > and walk to the hill with a stream downwards in the garden (east of the
> > map), standing at the highest point of the small hill, you can target
the
> > knight or his ph and nuke it, after a while the knight will go down the
> > stairs and come out the door and look for you, since all mobs should be
> > green nothing will agro you and you can kite nuke in the garden. Seems
> like
> > normal invis works for about 40% of the mobs (the weaker mobs like
> mummies
> > and dark bones) in there.
> >
> > Befallen is pretty easy but you have to find a good place to med or else
> you
> > will get whacked. Level 30+ you can solo everything including bottom
> floor.
> >
> > Sola .. some parts like foreman and predator only need about 30+ to solo
> > camp but if you wanna do lava elemental, gabbie and maybe some parts of
> the
> > castle, you will need to have ice comet...
> >
> > SG is simply kite nuke kite nuke but bad xp and not efficient in terms
of
> > time you have to med up (SG has much more hp than same level mob) / heal
> up
> > (if you get hit) / and the time you spend trying to gain speed so you
can
> > nuke the SG
> >
> > Maybe SolB you can do that since bugs section is pretty close to
> lavastorm
> > zone line. Maybe can pull bats, beetles and if you feel powerful you can
> try
> > lava duct crawlers...
> >
> > Mizy 47 monk lanys
> > 49 cleric
> > 49 druid
> > 50 wizard
> > 37 paladin
> > 37 bard
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: 04 April 2000 09:19
> > Subject: [sg-everquest] Hunting questions
> >
> >
> > > The lvl 50ishs in guild always busy hunting in planes or dragons, ever
> > > thought of hunting some other lvl 50ish+ mobs in Norrath?
> > >
> > > Eg
> > > - "Gozilla" (a dinosaur) in OOT, >lvl 50
> > > - Mist Castle Lord, the lvl 50 dracula
> > > - etc
> > >
> > > Btw, what's the min lvl for wiz to solo the following zones/mobs:
> > > - Lguk (think it's time to camp for some gator armors)
> > > - Permafrost (for runed circlet)
> > > - Hadden (for fishbone earring)
> > > - WK Ogre shaman (for batskull earring, what's the min lvl for me to
> > attack
> > > ths shaman while the other 5 guards won't swarm against me?)
> > > - OOT Oracle and her body guard (heard oracle robe is good money)
> > > - OOT ogre and hill giant
> > > - Unrest
> > > - Befallen
> > > - Sol A
> > > - SG in Sro/Oasis (kite and nuke)
> > >
> > > Thx.
> > >
> > > p/s: Any high lvl zone spot where PL-trainer can pull a red mob (con
to
> > lvl
> > > 40ish), whack it to 10% HP, zone and let us finish it to get the "reb
> mob"
> > > xp? ;)
> > >
